author: Kendall Waltz
title: NEWS: Disney To Pay $10 Million Fine for Collecting Children’s Data on YouTube
description:
Disney is paying a $10 million civil suit for collecting children's data from YouTube.
The post NEWS: Disney To Pay $10 Million Fine for Collecting Children’s Data on YouTube appeared first on AllEars.Net.
content:
According to Variety, Disney has agreed to pay a $10 million civil penalty for collecting children’s data on YouTube.
